title: Highfire: plan for survival
creator_credit: Bruce Kerner, William Brose and William Brose Productions
brief_description: Fire in high-rise buildings is a possibility that cannot be overlooked. This film is designed for all levels of employees and management in multi-storey buildings, and is a motivational film, demanding the viewer’s response to their own fire safety program.
